import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Container, Col, Row } from "reactstrap"; import "../assets/css/Navbar.css"; import classnames from "classnames"; import SearchImg from "../assets/imgs/search.png"; import EarthImg from "../assets/imgs/earth.png"; import UserImg from "../assets/imgs/user.png"; import CartImg from "../assets/imgs/cart.png"; import UpArrow from "../assets/imgs/up-arrow.png"; export default function Navbar() { const [isHover, setIsHover] = useState(false); const subWrapperClassName = classnames("sub-wrapper", { active: isHover }); const layoutClassName = classnames("layout", { active: isHover }); useEffect(() => { const nav_item = document.getElementsByClassName("nav-item"); for (let i = 0; i < nav_item.length; i++) { nav_item[i].addEventListener("mouseenter", (e) => { setIsHover(true); }); nav_item[i].addEventListener("mouseleave", (e) => { setIsHover(false); }); } }); return (
